languages.text: "Я... передам его наследникам ваши слова. Как и весть о том, что сам{mf||а} {name} фон Валанциус стал{mf||а} его палачом". {n}Голос Мастера вокса холоднее льда.{/n} "Вы многое сделали для нашей династии... и мы этого не забудем".

traits.locale_text: "Я... передам его наследникам ваши слова. Как и весть о том, что сам{mf||а} {name} фон Валанциус стал{mf||а} его палачом". {n}Голос Мастера Вокса холоднее льда.{/n} "Вы многое сделали для нашей династии... и мы этого не забудем".

languages.text: "I... will relay your words to his heirs. Along with the news that it was {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} who became his executioner." {n}The Vox Master's voice is cold as ice.{/n} "You have done much for our dynasty... We will never forget that."
languages.original_text: "Я... передам его наследникам ваши слова. Как и весть о том, что сам{mf||а} {name} фон Валанциус стал{mf||а} его палачом". {n}Голос Мастера вокса холоднее льда.{/n} "Вы многое сделали для нашей династии... и мы этого не забудем".

traits.locale_text: "I... will relay your words to his heirs. Along with the news that it was {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} who became his executioner." {n}The Vox Master's voice is cold as ice.{/n} "You have done much for our dynasty... And we will never forget that."

"I... will relay your words to his heirs. Along with the news that it was {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} who became his executioner." {n}The Vox Master's voice is cold as ice.{/n} "You have done much for our dynasty... And we will never forget that."

"I... will relay your words to his heirs. Along with the news that it was {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} who became his executioner." {n}The Vox Master's voice is cold as ice.{/n} "You have done much for our dynasty... We will never forget that."

"I... will relay your words to his heirs. Along with the news that it was {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} who became his executioner." {n}The Vox Master's voice is cold as ice.{/n} "You have done much for our dynasty... We will never forget that."

"I... will relay your words to his heirs. Along with the news that it was {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} who became his executioner." {n}The Vox Master's voice is cold as ice.{/n} "You have done much for our dynasty... We will never forget that."

languages.text: « Je... rapporterai vos paroles à ses héritiers. Et je n'oublierai pas de préciser que c'est {name} von Valancius en personne qui aura porté le coup fatal. {n}La voix du maître-vox est glaciale.{/n} Vous avez apporté une aide précieuse à notre dynastie... Nous ne l'oublierons pas. »
languages.original_text: "I... will relay your words to his heirs. Along with the news that it was {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} who became his executioner." {n}The Vox Master's voice is cold as ice.{/n} "You have done much for our dynasty... We will never forget that."

traits.locale_text: « Je... rapporterai vos paroles à ses héritiers. Et je n'oublierai pas de préciser que c'est {name} von Valancius en personne qui aura porté le coup fatal. {n}La voix du maître-vox est glaciale.{/n} Vous avez apporté une aide précieuse à notre dynastie... Nous ne l'oublierons pas. »

languages.text: “我……会把您的话转达给他的继承人。我也会传达，是{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯亲手处决了他。”{n}音阵大师的声音冷若冰霜。{/n}“您为我们的王朝做了这么多事情……我们永远不会忘记。”
languages.original_text: "I... will relay your words to his heirs. Along with the news that it was {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} who became his executioner." {n}The Vox Master's voice is cold as ice.{/n} "You have done much for our dynasty... We will never forget that."

traits.locale_text: “我……会把您的话转达给他的继承人。我也会传达，是{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯亲手处决了他。”{n}音阵大师的声音冷若冰霜。{/n}“您为我们的王朝做了这么多事情……我们永远不会忘记。”

languages.text: "Ich ... werde Eure Worte an seine Erben übermitteln. Und auch die Kunde, dass es {name} von Valancius selbst war, {mf|der zu seinem Henker|die zu ihrer Henkerin} geworden ist." {n}Die Stimme des Voxmeisters ist kalt wie Eis.{/n} "Ihr habt viel für unsere Dynastie getan ... Das werden wir nie vergessen."
languages.original_text: "I... will relay your words to his heirs. Along with the news that it was {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} who became his executioner." {n}The Vox Master's voice is cold as ice.{/n} "You have done much for our dynasty... We will never forget that."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... werde Eure Worte an seine Erben übermitteln. Und auch die Kunde, dass es {name} von Valancius selbst war, {mf|der zu seinem Henker|die zu ihrer Henkerin} geworden ist." {n}Die Stimme des Voxmeisters ist kalt wie Eis.{/n} "Ihr habt viel für unsere Dynastie getan ... Das werden wir nie vergessen."

languages.text: «Transmitiré sus palabras a sus herederos... Junto con la noticia de que fue {name} von Valancius quien acabó con su vida». {n}La voz del Vox Master suena fría como el hielo.{/n} «Ha hecho mucho por nuestra dinastía... Nunca lo olvidaremos».
languages.original_text: "I... will relay your words to his heirs. Along with the news that it was {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} who became his executioner." {n}The Vox Master's voice is cold as ice.{/n} "You have done much for our dynasty... We will never forget that."

traits.locale_text: «Transmitiré sus palabras a sus herederos... Junto con la noticia de que fue {name} von Valancius quien acabó con su vida». {n}La voz del Vox Master suena fría como el hielo.{/n} «Ha hecho mucho por nuestra dinastía... Nunca lo olvidaremos».

languages.text: 「私は…あなたの言葉を彼の後継者たちに伝えよう。そして、{name}フォン・ヴァランシウス{mf|閣下|閣下}が処刑人であったことも」{n}ヴォクス・マスターの声は冷たい氷のようだった。{/n}「あなたは私たちの王朝に多くのことをしてくれた…決して忘れない」
languages.original_text: "I... will relay your words to his heirs. Along with the news that it was {name} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself} who became his executioner." {n}The Vox Master's voice is cold as ice.{/n} "You have done much for our dynasty... We will never forget that."

traits.locale_text: 「私は…あなたの言葉を彼の後継者たちに伝えよう。そして、{name}フォン・ヴァランシウス{mf|閣下|閣下}が処刑人であったことも」{n}ヴォクス・マスターの声は冷たい氷のようだった。{/n}「あなたは私たちの王朝に多くのことをしてくれた…決して忘れない」
